interpretation: The "thong sandal" card represents simplicity, minimalism, and a laid-back attitude. This emoji symbolizes a carefree and relaxed lifestyle, where comfort and ease take precedence over luxury and extravagance. It may indicate that the querent is seeking a more uncomplicated way of living, free from the stresses and complexities of modern life. The thong sandal is also associated with the beach and vacations, suggesting that the querent may be yearning for a break from their daily routine. This card encourages the querent to embrace a more relaxed and easy-going approach to life, and to focus on the simple pleasures and joys that surround them.
